DOC.brief_summary: During early postoperative lung resection surgery , patient without oxygen supplementation may experience hypoxemia . Oxygen supplementation give via oxygen mask cannular . In study investigator want sudy effect oxygen supplementation via oxygen cannular first 120 minute surgery
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Nasal Cannula During First 2 Hours Postoperative Patient Undergoing Thoracotomy
DOC.criteria: age =/ > 18 year lobectomy pneumonectomy wedge resection ASA 13 preoperative oxygen saturation < 95 % receive epidural analgesia communication
